text: Mandi Bahauddin Tehsil is an administrative subdivision (tehsil) of Mandi Bahauddin District in the Punjab province of Pakistan. The city of Mandi Bahauddin is the headquarters of the tehsil. ==References== == Other websites == * Mandi-Bahauddin * Mandi-Bahauddin Category:Tehsils of Punjab (Pakistan) Category:Mandi Bahauddin District
title: Mandi Bahauddin Tehsil
